meanings: Noun 돼지고기나 베이컨의 가느다란 조각 ((살코기 사이에 끼우는))
When you eat too much food and your belly is too big to even see your own cock.
When you get aroused at the thought of consuming large amounts of fatty food.

examples.english: Brown the lardons in a frying-pan in their own fat and scatter them over the lettuces. 발음
Add the lardons of bacon and cook well. 발음
Gratin of Brussels sprouts with lardons, cream and almonds by Sophie Grigson. 발음
Saute in the oil with the lardons, garlic and thyme until softened (about 10 minutes). 발음
I don't know I'm just seeing where my taste buds take me!! Or fry off some lardons and add to it. 발음
